stepAnswer: Arts and Humanities (e.g., literature, history, philosophy, linguistics, religious studies, art history, theater, visual arts)
stepTitle: Please indicate the discipline / field that you study or work in.
choices: Social sciences, business and law (Social and behavioural science, journalism and information, business and administration, law)
Science (Life sciences, physical sciences, mathematics and statistics, computing)
Engineering, manufacturing and construction (Engineering and engineering trades, manufacturing and processing, architecture and building)
